text: Antonio Seguí (; 11 January 1934 – 26 February 2022) was an Argentine cartoonist, painter, engraver, book illustrator, and sculptor. Seguí's work were seen at the MoMA, Buenos Aires Museum of Modern Art, and Centre Georges Pompidou, among others. He died in Paris on 26 February 2022, at the age of 88.Murió Antonio Seguí, el gran embajador del arte argentino ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Argentine artists
title: Antonio Seguí
